body.text:
{% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Batutuwan da aka zaba: Hakora masu zafi 
Zaɓi tambayoyin cikin jerin da ke ƙasa, don samun shawarwarin kula da baki

 1. Abubuwan sanyi
 2. Saboda magani
 3. Tsami ko Gafi{%else%}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Selected Topic: Sensitive teeth

 Choose an option.

 1. Eating Cold items
 2. Doubt of sensitivity
 3. Eating Sour food.{%endif%}

sections.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Hakora masu zafi: 1{%else%}Sensitive teeth: 1{%endif%}

rows.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Abubuwan sanyi{%else%}Eating Cold items{%endif%}
rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Idan ina cin/shan abu mai sanyi ba zato ba tsanmani sai ciwo mai kaifi .{%else%}Sudden or sharp pain in my teeth when eating/drinking something cold.{%endif%}

sections.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Hakora masu zafi: 2{%else%}Sensitive teeth: 2{%endif%}

rows.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Saboda magani{%else%}Doubt of sensitivity{%endif%}
rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Alamun suna kama da labaran talabijin{%else%}I see TV information about teeth sensitivity, and I think I may have it.{%endif%}

sections.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Hakora masu zafi: 3{%else%}Sensitive teeth: 3{%endif%}

rows.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Tsami ko Gafi{%else%}Eating Sour food{%endif%}
rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Shan wani abu mai tsami ko gafi.{%else%}I have a sharp pain when eating/drinking something sour or acidic.{%endif%}
